scripts.client:build: parcel watch src/client/index.html --out-dir build/client --out-file index.html --target browser --no-autoinstall --no-cache --hmr-port 8080
scripts.server:build: parcel watch src/server/index.ts --out-dir build/server --target  --out-file index.js node --no-autoinstall --no-hmr --no-cache
scripts.start: npm run client:build & npm run server:build & npm run server
